H0.text: Which US state is known as The First State as it was first to ratify the Constitution in 1787. Pennsylvania

H1.text: Which US state is known as The First State as it was first to ratify the Constitution in 1787. Massachusetts

H2.text: Which US state is known as The First State as it was first to ratify the Constitution in 1787. Virginia

H3.text: Which US state is known as The First State as it was first to ratify the Constitution in 1787. Del.

A4.text: Delaware was the first state to ratify the Constitution of the United States on December 7, 1787, earning it the nickname 'The First State'.
